name: microwave
device_info: this is a device used to heat up food

parameters.name: state
parameters.info: turns the microwave on or off. 1 for on. 0 for off

parameters.name: time
parameters.info: time for how long to turn the microwave on for

parameters.name: mode
parameters.info: what heating level the microwave should be at. 0 for mild, 1 for warm, 2 for hot, 3 for full
